duration_in_months: It is expected that the contract will start on 2023-11-01 and end on 2023-03-31
full_summary:
**Title**: Technical, Engineering and Support Maintenance (ETISM) for Canadian Naval Influence Range Systems
**Reference Number**: cb-8358-14612164
**Publication Date**: August 22, 2023
**Closing Date**: September 11, 2023 at 14:00:00


**Description**: The Department of National Defence is seeking a maintenance support service for its Canadian Naval Influence Range Systems. The systems comprise specialized hardware and software for tracking and measuring underwater and above-water signatures. The requirement includes personnel in Labour Categories: Senior Software Specialist (250 hours), Senior Engineers (2,200 hours), and Technologist or Junior Engineer (1,000 hours).

**Security Requirements**: This requirement is subject to security controls. Bidders must consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses. Bidders must also refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada for additional information.

**Personnel and Organization Security Screening**: Bidders are required to provide the required information as specified in article 2.4 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives. This includes provision of information for personnel and organization security screening.

**Procurement Details**: This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program, and suppliers must be compliant with the Defence Production Act.

**Contract Award**: The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any aspect of the procurement.

**Languages and Delivery**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The procurement category is SRVTGD, and the procurement method is competitive, open bidding.

**Tender Notice**: The tender notice is available for download at this [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8358/w8482-231290-rfp-eng.pdf) (English) and [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8358/w8482-231290_rfp_fr.pdf) (French).

**Attachments**: Bidder information packages are available for download from the [Canadabuy page](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
